body_html: @jfpuget Thank you for responding. Gradient clipping and optimizer selection only delayed the nanification process, but could not prevent it. However, based on the discussion here, simply increasing the batch size got it working again.
body_text: @jfpuget Thank you for responding. Gradient clipping and optimizer selection only delayed the nanification process, but could not prevent it. However, based on the discussion here, simply increasing the batch size got it working again.
body: @jfpuget Thank you for responding. Gradient clipping and optimizer selection only delayed the nanification process, but could not prevent it. However, based on the discussion [here](https://github.com/keras-team/keras/issues/2134), simply increasing the batch size got it working again.
